text: The list of episodes for The CW/BET sitcom The Game. A total of 147 episodes aired over nine seasons. ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Backdoor pilot (2006)=== ===Season 1 (2006–07)=== ===Season 2 (2007–08)=== ===Season 3 (2008–09)=== ===Season 4 (2011)=== * Brittany Daniel and Coby Bell character statuses were demoted to special appearances. Brittany Daniel departs from the series after the eighth episode this season and returns the seventh season. ===Season 5 (2012)=== On April 12, 2011, it was announced that The Game was renewed for a fifth season, consisting 22 episodes. It was announced on the 2011 BET Awards Pre-show that it will begin in January 2012. This is Tia Mowry-Hardrict’s last season to appear and returns in the series finale. ===Season 6 (2013)=== * Pooch Hall departs from the series after the 100th episode his returns in the series finale. * Jay Ellis and Lauren London joined the cast as series regular in this season. ===Season 7 (2014)=== * Brittany Daniel returns this season beginning with the fourth episode. ===Season 8 (2015)=== ===Season 9 (2015)=== * Tia Mowry & Pooch Hall returns this season beginning with the tenth and final episode. ==References== Category:Lists of television series episodes
title: List of The Game episodes
